name: Tanistry
description:
Tanistry is an action rogue-lite where you improve your character through genetics rather than leveling up.  Choose who to marry and which of your children you want to continue playing as.  Select for good traits like psychokinesis, while avoiding bad traits like nearsightedness.

This game is currently in development, so it's free!  All I want is your feedback.  Feel free to leave comments here or hit me up on twitter @SamBryceDev.
